concept.title: Step 5: Configure SSL properties in gfcpp.properties and gemfire.properties

li.p: In gfcpp.properties, set ssl-enabled (page 174) to true and set ssl-keystore (page 174) and ssl-truststore(page 174) to point to your keystore files.
